statements: DELETE FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = FALSE;
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = false AND task_deadline < CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE task_id IN (SELECT id FROM tasks WHERE task_name ILIKE 'Complete%' AND deadline < '2022-10-31');
DELETE FROM tasks WHERE is_completed = true AND deadline < NOW();
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE task_description = 'Complete Project';
DELETE FROM reminders WHERE is_completed = FALSE AND deadline < '2022-12-31';
DELETE FROM notifications WHERE user_id = 2 AND reminder_id = 3;
